title: The Writer's Almanac - Friday, July 24, 2020
description: It’s the birthday hymn writer John Newton (1725), a trader of African slaves who later became a vocal abolitionist. He wrote the song “Amazing Grace.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It’s the birthday hymn writer John Newton (1725), a trader of African slaves who later became a vocal abolitionist. He wrote the song “Amazing Grace.”
